entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
